thread.title: Cheryl shares gorgeous Brits photo on Instagram
thread.title_full: Cheryl shares gorgeous Brits photo on Instagram

title: Cheryl shares gorgeous Brits photo on Instagram
text:
Cheryl shares gorgeous Brits photo on Instagram February 22, 2017 by Ainhoa Barcelona Cheryl has been taking a break from Instagram but on Wednesday she thrilled her followers with a throwback photo Leave a comment 
She's been keeping a low-profile in recent months, but on Wednesday Cheryl thrilled fans when she posted a gorgeous throwback photo on Instagram . The pregnant singer, who is expecting her first baby with boyfriend Liam Payne , shared an image taken seven years ago from the Brits . The Geordie beauty looked glam from head-to-toe, wearing a glittering, sheer gown. Ahead of Wednesday night's awards ceremony, she wrote: "Wishing all the Brit nominees and performers good luck for the show tonight. Looking forward to it. In the meantime here is my #tb #bts vogue shoot I did for the Brits 2010." 
Cheryl's baby bump: all the photos! 
Cheryl's stunning photo marked the second time she has posted on Instagram this year. She returned to the social media app last week after a hiatus, choosing to share some exciting news with her followers. While her personal life has been making headlines, Cheryl shifted the focus to her charity work, by announcing: "I am so happy and excited to tell you that after a 5 year relationship with @PrincesTrust and a 2 year mission along with Cheryl's Trust we have finally found a centre in the heart of Newcastle that will be opened this summer! Part of me is still pinching myself!"
